thread.title: S Split Corp. Declares Monthly Distributions

author: cnbc.com
title: S Split Corp. Declares Monthly Distributions
text:
TORONTO, April 03, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- S Split Corp. (TSX:SBN) (TSX:SBN.PR.A) has declared monthly distributions payable on April 30, 2018 to shareholders of record on April 13, 2018 in the following amounts per share:
Share Class Ticker Amount Per Share Class A Shares SBN $0.04225 Preferred Shares SBN.PR.A $0.04375 To the extent that any portions of the distributions are ordinary taxable dividends and not capital gain dividends, they are eligible dividends.
For further information, please contact Investor Relations at 416.681.3966, toll free at 1.800.725.7172 or visit www.strathbridge.com .
John Germain, Senior Vice-President & CFO Strathbridge Asset Management Inc.
121 King Street West
Suite 2600
Toronto, Ontario M5H 3T9
416.681.3966; 1.800.725.7172
www.strathbridge.com
info@strathbridge.com
Source:S Split Corp.
